author: kmd (a小調行板賦格曲)
content:
職缺: C++ Software Engineer

公司名稱，統編(中華民國以外註冊可免填):HLX Technology 註冊於香港

公司地址(填寫詳細至號):台北市忠孝東路五段68號 (國泰置地/信義微風樓上)




職缺能力經歷要求:
* 2+ years of C/C++ experience
* 1+ years of software layer networking experience (TCP/UDP/IP), e.g.
IP camera, NAS, VoIP, IoT experience.
* A proven ability to develop efficient server side solutions in C++
* Strong background in data structures, algorithms, and object-oriented
programming
* Excellent design, debugging, and problem solving skills (can analyze
and fix problems quickly)
* Ability to prioritize multiple tasks and apply cutting-edge technologies
in a fast-paced environment
* Strong communication skills: can clearly describe technology concepts
at both high level (abstract interface) and low level (step-by-step algorithm)
* Bachelor's degree or above in computer science, computer engineering,
electrical engineering, or other related science/engineering specialties.




Pluses (desirable to have):
* A technical understanding of:
  * Runtime performance issues such as cache misses, CPU instructions,
    strace in an embedded system / firmware environment.
  * Asynchronous programming techniques
  * Source control and release management
* Development experience in
  * Client side GUIs
  * Web frameworks
* Knowledge of:
  * High-performance/high-throughput/low-latency computing
  * Design patterns, low-level/systems programming, multithreading
  * Linux, system/processor performance, kernel, and network communication




Job Responsibilities:
We are looking to hire a C++ developer to accelerate our development of
an electronic trading platform.  You will be working on the backend trading
gateways, risk management tools and GUIs in a distributed system environment
with other developers.  This is an exciting opportunity to contribute
directly to the software stack of an established algorithmic trading company.
* Develop/debug/support high performance trading systems in production
  environment
* Optimize performance & latency of software using network and systems
  programming
* Architect low level API to support trading and data feed infrastructure.
* Troubleshoot/debug high performance servers and low latency networks
* Build tools for performance-tracking and risk-management
* Communicate with team members and users in other countries


員工是否需自備工具? (是/否) :否

薪資(月薪):年薪100萬-300萬，按工作經歷

薪資(保證最低年薪，必填項目): 12個月

年終獎金計算方式:按績效發放


工時:

每日工作時間: 09:00AM~5:00PM (八小時)  中午休息(12:00~1:00)
每周工作時間: 8*5=40

加班費制度:比照勞基法




工作環境與該職缺團隊介紹:
HLX Technology (“HLX”) is a quantitative research and technology firm. HLX
develops advanced mathematical models and innovative technology solutions to
analyze global financial markets. Its founders have extensive experience in
the financial industry and advanced degrees in science, technology,
engineering, and mathematics from the world’s leading universities.

We are currently seeking talented, articulate, highly-motivated candidates
who will contribute to the design, development, and maintenance of automated,
low latency C++ trading systems. This position will have a high degree of
autonomy as well as responsibility in the design, direction, and approach
in these tasks. We value developers who are extremely detail oriented but
can thrive in a fast-paced environment.

We believe in a casual and collaborative atmosphere in which the candidate
can become an integral part of a smaller team. This position allows for a
high degree of freedom as well as the ability to be actively involved in the
solutions to a variety of challenging problems.  While the work is rigorous
and demands a high level of commitment, the firm maintains an open,
cooperative and collegial atmosphere.
